GK16visa10cu:2617: (lo, u) kvacidekadeśe āropyā āropaviṣayavācake pade vyaṅgyatayā nirdiṣṭāḥ
GK16visa10cu:2625: ayaṃ sudhāṃśuḥ amareśadiśaḥ prācyāḥ, mukhaṃ vicumbati /
GK16visa10cu:2626: kiṃ kṛtvā ? udāmahīdhararūpasya stanasyāgre karaṃ raśmimeva karaṃ pāṇiṃ nidhāya, stanāgre kīdṛśe galitaṃ tama. paṭalarūpamaṃśukaṃ yatna tādṛśe /
GK16visa10cu:2636: na cātra śliṣṭaparamparitam ? atra hi “bhūbṛdāvalidambholiḥ--” ityādau rājādau parvatatvādyāropa vinā varṇanīyasya rājāderdambholitādirūpaṇaṃ
GK16visa10cu:2638: tarhi kathaṃ “padmodayadinādhīśaḥ-” ityādau paramparitam, rājādeḥ sūryādinā sādṛśyasya tejasvitādihetukasya saṃbhavāditi na vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:2639: tathā hi--rājādestejastitādihetukaṃ suvyaktaṃ sādṛśyam, na tu prakṛte
GK16visa10cu:2641: iha tu mahīdharādeḥ stanādinā sādṛśyaṃ pīnotuṅgatvādinā suvyaktameveti na śliṣṭaparamparitam
GK16visa10cu:2646: paramparitaṃ yad rūpakaṃ tadeva mukhyarūpakasādhakaṃ natu sādṛśyaṃ tatsādhakam /
GK16visa10cu:2647: yatra tu sādṛśyādapi mukhyarūpakaṃ siddhyati na tatra paramparitarūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:2649: nanu yadi sādṛśyāsattve eva paramparitarūpakaṃ, tadā “ padmodaya”
GK16visa10cu:2665: evaṃ ca “bhramimarati “ mityādau viṣaṃ jalameva viṣamityāropo jalade prasiddhasādṛśyabhujagasyārope nimittamiti śliṣṭaparamparitameva /
GK16visa10cu:2666_0: atra “vidvanmānasahaṃsa” ityādau rājādau haṃsatvāropo mānase mānasatvārope heturiti manyamānā āhuḥ--”neha viṣaśabdasya dvyarthatā
GK16visa10cu:2668: jalade bhujagasādṛśyasya sakalakalaṃ puramityādāviva viṣaśabdasya dvyarthatāṃ vinānupapatteḥ
GK16visa10cu:2669: kiñca jaladabhujagajaṃ viṣaṃ jalamiti na ghaṭate /
GK16visa10cu:2671: tasmād viṣameva viṣamiti rūpaṇamākṣipyaiva vācyarūpaṇaṃ saṃgacchate /
GK16visa10cu:2672: naca śleṣamātneṇāstu vācyarūpaṇopapattiriti yuktaṃ, śleṣeṇa tādātmyāpratīteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2677: indutviṣo yudhi haṭhena tavārikīrtti- rānīya yatra ramate
GK16visa10cu:2679: iha ekadeśavarttini rūpake kṣitibhṛd rājā eva kṣitibhṛt parvata iti śliṣṭam /
GK16visa10cu:2680: tātrālaṅkārikacaṇḍidāsapaṇḍitādayaḥ rājani parvatatvāropaṇaṃ nistriṃśasya tamālavanatvāropaṇe heturiti śliṣṭaparimparitamādriyante /
GK16visa10cu:2682: tathāhi kṣitibhṛto vdyarthatayā “vidvanmānasahaṃsa'; ityādau mānasatvāde rājño haṃsatvādirūpaṇanimittamiva, nistriṃśasya tamālavanatvarūpaṇopayogitvam /
GK16visa10cu:2684: pratāpakīrttyornāyikanāyikātvopakaraṇatvād iha prakṛtasūtroktaṃ śliṣṭaikadeśarūpyaṃ sāvayavaikadeśavivartirūpakameva bhāvituṃ yuktaṃ, natu śliṣṭaparamparitamiti manyāmahe /
GK16visa10cu:2685: kiñca śliṣṭaparamparite vidvanmānasahaṃsetyādau rājño haṃsatvaṃ mānasasya mānasatvāropaṇasādṛśyaṃ vināsiddham /
GK16visa10cu:2686: iha tu nistriṃśasya tamālavanāntatvaṃ nīlimādināpi prasiddham /
GK16visa10cu:2690: kevalaṃ mānasādipadeṣu ākṣipyamāṇaṃ sarovarādyartharūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ haṃsatvādisādhakamātram
GK16visa10cu:2691: ataevātra kṣaṇadānibhetyasyāpi padasya rātrikālākṣepeṇa aniḥ śeṣaṃ bhātīti tamaso bahulībhāvāt haṭharamaṇopayogiteti prācyānāmapi vyākhyā /
GK16visa10cu:2692: tadevaṃ kṣitibhṛta ityādi sarveṣāṃ rūpyamāṇānāṃ haṭharamaṇopakaraṇatvād yathoktameva jyāyaḥ
GK16visa10cu:2694: āntarnimagnacarapuṣpaśaro 'tipātā-- tkiṃ kiṃ cakāra taruṇo nayadīkṣaṇāgniḥ //
GK16visa10cu:2695: ityatra nayanāgneḥ taruṇatvasya prauḍhatvarūpamarthamādāya prathamamabhidhāyā viśrāmād vyañjanayaiva yuvarūpor'thaḥ pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:2696: iha tu kṣitibhṛta ityādau bahūnāṃ rūpaṇāt pratāpasya taruṇatvarūpaṇaṃ śābdam /
GK16visa10cu:2697: itaśca ramata ityādipadānāṃ rūpakasādhakataiva, natu dyāmāliliṅga ityādāvāliṅganādīnāmiva samāsoktisādhakatā /
GK16visa10cu:2699: haṭhādānīya ramata ityatra kāryyasāmye 'pi na samāsoktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2700: yadi hi kāryyaleśasāmyaṃ vā samāśritya samāsoktiraṅgīkāryyā tadekadeśavivartirūpakasya viṣayāpahāra eva syāt, tasyānevaṃvidhasva lakṣyasyāprasiddheḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2701: yatra vācā rūpaṇaṃ nāsti dyāmāliliṅgetyādi samāsoktyudāharaṇavat
GK16visa10cu:2703: ābhātītyādau ca vācyarūpaṇānāṃ bahutvena kāryyādisāmyaṃ svalpatayā tatsahāyyamevācarati iti
GK16visa10cu:2705: anayośca samāsoktyekadeśavivartirūpakayoraparamapi yuktijātamihaiva samāsoktiprastāve suvyaktaṃ bhaviṣyatītyalaṃ bahunā /
GK16visa10cu:2712: “rājamaṇḍalarāhave” ityādiṣu sarvatra samāsa eva tasya darśitatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:2717: tathā cātra bhrūlatayā hetunā madhupaśreṇīṃ vidhirvidadhe ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2718: bhrūlatāṃ vidhātuṃ madhupaśreṇīṃ vidadhe iti paryyavasitor'thaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2722: vidadha ityādau tava bhrūlatā madhupaśreṇī ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2725: yaireṣāpi durāśayā kaliyuge rājāvalī sevitā teṣāṃ śūlini bhaktimātrasulabhe sevā kiyatkauśalam”
GK16visa10cu:2731: atra kaliyuge yairdurāśayā eṣā rājāvalī nṛpaśreṇī sevitā bhaktimātrasulabhe śūlini teṣāṃ sevā kiyat kauśalam /
GK16visa10cu:2736: sucaritarūpaṃ yadālekhyaṃ vastu, tasya dyurūpā gaganarūpā
GK16visa10cu:2765: ime netre rātrindivamadhikaśobhe kuvalaye tanurlāvaṇyānāṃ jaladhiravagāhe
GK16visa10cu:2774: evamuttaratra sudhādhārāyā ādhāro 'dharaścirakālasthameva pariṇataṃ pakkaṃ bimbam /
GK16visa10cu:2778: kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyātparaṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede” //
GK16visa10cu:2784: avagāhe sukhatara ityatra lavaṇedadhirmakarataraṅgalavaṇādisadbhāvādavagāhakānāṃ sukhāvaho na bhavatītyāśayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2788: kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyātparaṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede” //
GK16visa10cu:2791: na khalu sambharaṇapuṣpe maṇḍanāstrayoḥ kāraṇe, kintu tatsvarūpe /
GK16visa10cu:2793: tadapyasat, tatkāryyasya śarīraśobhākaraṇasya madanoddīpanasya ca prastutvena kenacid anusandhīyamānatvābhāvāt
GK16visa10cu:2798: ityādivad atiśayoktireva bhavituṃ yukteti māmakaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2811: (lo, ā) viṣaya āropaviṣayaḥ, tadātmatayā, tadrūpatayā natu rūpakavat
GK16visa10cu:2813: evaṃ cāsya viṣayātmatvena, prakṛte kāryyopayogitvena rūpakād
GK16visa10cu:2815: rūpake vidyamānāyā api tādātmyapratīterna paryyantaṃ gantumākāṅkṣā ityāśayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2816: pariṇāmālaṅkārasya tathābhūto rūpyamāṇo vidyate yad etaddviprakāraṃ pariṇāmaṃ nāma nirvakti
GK16visa10cu:2820: natu sato dharmiṇo vai pūrvarūpaparityāgena rūpāntarāpatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2833: atrā'śleṣe āropyamāṇaḥ paṇo vāstavaśleṣatayaiva pariṇataḥ anuṣṭhīyamānadyūtopayogī /
GK16visa10cu:2841: iha tūpāyanoderviṣayeṇa tādātmyaṃ prakṛte ca nāyakasaṃbhāvanādāvupayogaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2842: ata eva rūpake āropyasyāvacchedakatvamātreṇānvayaḥ, atra tu tādātmyena /
GK16visa10cu:2853: upāyanena sambhāvanasya paṇena dyūtasya ca nirvāhāt /
GK16visa10cu:2867: tādātmyaṃ tatra niveśaḥ smitādeḥ upāyanatvamasti tadviśeṣakatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:2869: “dāse kṛtāgasi-” ityādau rūpakameva, na tu pariṇāmaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2875: nanvatra kathaṃ rūpakamevetyuktaṃ sūkṣmāgratvena kaṭhoratvena ca pulakāṅkurāṇāṃ kaṇṭakabhedasya vāstavatvādevetyāha---āropyamāṇeti /
GK16visa10cu:2877: atra yadyapi pulakasya kaṇṭakāropaviṣayatvameva kaṇṭakatvenāropyamāṇatvaṃ yathāpi pādabhedakāryyakatve
GK16visa10cu:2879: tathāca tatkāryyanirvāhakatvaṃ yatastasyāropyamāṇamatastasya kaṇṭakatvamapi na vāstavam /
GK16visa10cu:2888: ityatrāpi gurudakṣiṇāyāḥ suratinaipuṇyena pariṇāmāt pariṇaāmālaṅkāra eveti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:2896: yatra himālaye auṣadhaya eva rajanyāṃ vanecarāṇāṃ vanitāsakhānāṃ suratapradīpā bhavanti ityanvayaḥ
GK16visa10cu:2903: naca suratameva śābdaṃ prakṛtaṃ nāndhakāranāśaḥ; tasyāśābdatvāditi vācyam ? suratopayogitvena tasyāpi prakṛtatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:2916: evaṃca saṃśaya ityetāvataiva lakṣaṇe paryāpte prakṛte anyasyeti vacanaṃ “madhyaṃ tava “ ityādi vṛttyudāhariṣyamāṇavyavacchedārtham /
GK16visa10cu:2917: pratibhotthita iti, pratibhā kaveḥ, tayā utthitaḥ ādṛtaḥ,evañca
GK16visa10cu:2918: kavivarṇitasyāpi “sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā” iti saṃśayasya nālaṅkāratā /
GK16visa10cu:2921: yatra saṃśaya eva paryavasānaṃ sa śuddhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2923: “kiṃ tāruṇyataroriyaṃ rasabhahodbhinnā navā vallarī velāprocchalitasya kiṃ
GK16visa10cu:2925: udrāḍhotkalikāvatāṃ svasamayopanyāsaviśrambhiṇaḥ kiṃ sākṣādupadeśayaṣṭirathavā devasya śṛṅgāriṇaḥ”
GK16visa10cu:2928: iyaṃ nāyikā kiṃ lāvaṇyataroḥ navā vallarī ! lāvaṇyarūpatarvāśritā navā latetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2929: kīdṛśī rasabharodbhinnā śṛṅgararasa eva rasojalaṃ tenodbhinno jalasekena latodbhedāt /
GK16visa10cu:2930: kiṃvā velayā nīreṇa procchalitasya ucchalitasya lāvaṇyarūpasya vārāṃnidheḥ samudrasyalaharikā taraṅgaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2932: kiṃ vā śṛṅgāriṇo devasya kandarpasya arthāt śṛṅgārārthamuddamotkalikānatāṃ gāḍhotkaṇṭhāvatāṃ janānāṃ sthāne upadeśasya arthāt śṛṅgāropadeśsya sākṣād vaṣṭiṇalambanabhūtā yaṣṭiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2934: devasya kīdṛśasya svasamayasya vasantasya upanyāsena viśrammiṇo viśvastasya mamedānīmupadeśo yogya ityaveṃ viśvāsavata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2941: strasamayopanyāsaviśrambhiṇaḥ svasammatārthakathane viśvāsapravarttakasya sākṣād upadeśayaṣṭiḥ, yaṣṭyākāramūrttimattvena pratyakṣamuddeśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2943: tathāhi---yasyāḥ kasyā api vidyāyā upadeṣṭāraḥ capalacittanivāraṇāya tāḍanārthaṃ yaṣṭimādadate iti lokaprasiddhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2944: yatrādāvante ca saṃśaya eva madhye niścayaḥ sa niścayamadhyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2946: “ayaṃ mārtaṇḍaḥ kiṃ sa khalu turagaiḥ saptabhiritaḥ kṛśānuḥ kiṃ sarvāḥ
GK16visa10cu:2948: kṛtāntaḥ kiṃ sākṣānmahiṣavahano 'sāviti punaḥ samālokyājau tvāṃ vidadhati vikalpān pratibhaṭāḥ”
GK16visa10cu:2950: (lo, ṛ) sarvā diśo na prasarati, kintūrdhvameva jvalatīti prasiddham /
GK16visa10cu:2956: ājau yuddhe tvāṃ samālokya pratibhaṭāḥ pratikūlavīrā ityevaṃ vitarkān vidadhati kurvānti /
GK16visa10cu:2961: ayaṃ tu sarvadikprasārī, ato na kṛśānurityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2967: yatrādau saṃśayo 'nte ca niścayaḥ sa niścayāntaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2977: kīdṛśaiḥ bakasahavāsināṃ parokṣaiḥ--bakā hi matsyaniścayārthaṃ dhyāyinastatsahavāsinastataḥ śikṣitadhyānāsteṣāmapi parokṣaiḥ apratyakṣaiḥ
GK16visa10cu:2979: apratibhotthāpite tu “sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā” ityādisaṃśaye nāyamalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2986: asti nāstīti saṃdehaḥ kasya citte na bhāsate” //
GK16visa10cu:2991: sandehaḥ kasya citte na bhāsate ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2992: tatrātiśayoktiḥ iti vakṣyamāṇāyāḥ pañcavidhāyā atiśayokterbhede 'pyabhedāroparūpaprabheda evātretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3001: bhrāntiścittadharmaviśeṣo vidyate yatra bhramaprakāre sa bhrāntimān ityanvarthanāmālaṅkāraḥ
GK16visa10cu:3003: “mugdhā dugdhadhiyā gavāṃ vidadhate kumbhānagho vallavāḥ karṇe
GK16visa10cu:3005: karkandhūphasamuccinoti śabarī muktāphalāśaṅkayā sāndrā candramaso na kasya kurute cittabhramaṃ candrikā” //
GK16visa10cu:3010: candramasaḥ sāndrā candrikā kasya janasya cittavibhramaṃ na kurute ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3012: ballavāḥ gopāḥ mugdhā bhrāntāḥ santaḥ dugdhadhiyā gavāmadhaḥ kumbhān vidadhate dugdhamādātumityarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:3031: saṅge saiva tathaikā tribhuvanamapi tanmayaṃ virahe” //
GK16visa10cu:3038: na cātrāpi tribhuvane tatsādṛśyabhramāttadbhrama iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:3040: tathāca saṅgamād virahasyādhikyād vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ evāyamiti bhāvaḥ
GK16visa10cu:3041: evaṃ ca lobhādinā bhrame 'pi na bhrāntimān /
GK16visa10cu:3053: ekasyānekadhollekho yaḥ sa ullekha ucyate // VisSd_10.37 //
GK16visa10cu:3062: “priya iti gopavadhūbhiḥ śiśuriti vṛddhairadhīśa iti devaiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3070: “āpo hi nārāḥ” tadayanaḥ tatstho nārāyaṇaḥ jalaśāyī ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3071: atraikasyāpi bhagavatastattadguṇayogādanekadhollekhe gopavadhūprabhṛtīnāṃ rucyādayo yathāyogaṃ prayojakāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3075: saca priya ityatra saundaryarūpaḥ, śiśurityatra strehaviṣayatvam,
GK16visa10cu:3076: adhīśa ityatraiśvaryyam, nārāyaṇa ityatra dhyānopayogimūrttimadabhinnatvam, brahmetyatra tadvyāvṛttasvarūpābhinnatvam /
GK16visa10cu:3078: tathāca tādṛśarucimanto grahītāro bhinnā iti darśitam /
GK16visa10cu:3084: ekasminnarthe anusandhānena manoniveśena sādhita ābhāsaḥ jñānaṃ buddhirapi yathārucyādi---bhedāt bhidyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3091: evaṃ ca priya ityādau bhagavataḥ priyatve gopavadhūnāṃ rucyāditritayamapi prayojakam /
GK16visa10cu:3094: atra bhagavataḥ priyatvādīnāṃ vāstavatvād grahītṛbhedācca na mālārūpakam,
GK16visa10cu:3098: na ceha bhagavati gopavadhūprabhṛtibhiḥ priyatvādyadhyavasīyate priyatvāderbhagavati tatkāle tāttvikatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3100: (vi, ka) atra mālārūpakaprasāktiṃ nirasyati---atra bhagavata iti /
GK16visa10cu:3103: yadyapi vāstavatvena rūpakāprasaktau mālārūpakaprasaktirapi tata eva nirastā tathāpi grahītṛbhedapradarśanaṃ mālāpariṇāmaprasaktivāraṇasūcanārtham /
GK16visa10cu:3113: kintu priyatvādyadhyavasīyate iti kvacit prāmādikaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3114: sa cādhyavasīyata ityatra nirasyate ityevaṃ lakṣaṇayā samarthanīyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3118: (lo, i) bhagavatastatkāle tāttvikatvād grītṛbhedācceti hetordvayamapi mālārūpakabhrāntimatordvayorapi vivekaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3122: grotṛbhedasya ca dvayorapi sambhave 'pi apavādatvena ullekhākhyabhinnālaṅkārasya na prayojakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3126_0: uktodāharaṇe ca śiśutvādīnāṃ niyamanābhiprāyātpriyatvādīnāṃ bhinnatvādhyavasāya ityatiśayoktirasti, tatsadbhāve 'pi grahītṛbhedena
GK16visa10cu:3127: (vi, kha) alaṅkārāntarasaṅkarāt tadbhaṅgimūla eva niyamenāyamalaṅkāra iti kecidāhuḥ taddarśayati---keciditi
GK16visa10cu:3133: tathāca yūni deve śiśubhinne 'pi niyamataḥ śiśvabhedāropād bhede
GK16visa10cu:3135: atra ca niyamapradarśanaṃ teṣāṃ tathātvena bhāvanātiśayapradarśanārthameva, natu tasyātiśayoktighaṭanārthateti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:3138: tathā ca bhinnārthādhyavasāya ityatra bhinnatvavatyadhyavasāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3140: tathā ca asvāmini deve svāmitvāropa eva svāmyabhedāropa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3144: nanvevamatiśayoktisattve sa evātrāṅkāro 'stu nollekha ityata āha---tatsadbhaṇepīti /
GK16visa10cu:3153: “api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vartate iti yatra prayoktṛpratipatroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ, sa ca bhedapratyayapuraḥ

GK16visa10cu:3707: “saiṣā sthalī yatra vicinvatā tvāṃ bhraṣṭaṃ mayā nūpuramekamurvyām /
GK16visa10cu:3712: (vi, śa) saiṣā sthalīti---puṣpakasthāṃ sītāṃ prati rāmasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:3713: tvāṃ vicinvatā vicārayatā mayā, yatra bhraṣṭamarthāttvaccaraṇātpatitamekaṃ nūpuramadṛśyata saiṣā sthalī /
GK16visa10cu:3724: guṇasya phalagāmitvaṃ yathā--- “sadā kīrtimukhaṃ padmaṃ puṇyārthamiva
GK16visa10cu:3727: jātyuprekṣāyāḥ phalagāmitvaṃ yathā-- “kāmukasya ratau vāmā kandarpaśarapīḍitā /
GK16visa10cu:3729: “ atra nityāyā api sukhatvajāterduḥ khe āropyatvarūpavāñchāyāḥ
GK16visa10cu:3735: '; ityādiṣu dravoyatprekṣāyā api hetugāmitvaṃ sambhavati tathāpi
GK16visa10cu:3740: yadvā nūpumaunitvahetuścaladdravyasaṃyogābhāva evaṃduḥ khatādātmyena adhyavasitaḥ tatra ca pakṣe 'tiśayoktivad viṣayasya gamyamānatā etaccāgre
GK16visa10cu:3745: saṃprati tu nimittānukrivaśādeva ṣoḍaśaprakārapraveśāt ṣaṭpañcāśadvidhatvaṃ darśayitumāha---uktyanuktyoriti
GK16visa10cu:3746: jātyāditrayasya phalahetugatvena nimittānuktyasambhavasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt trayasya dravyagotprekṣāyāḥ svarūpagāmitva eva nimittānuktisambhavādāha---dvidheti /
GK16visa10cu:3749: teṣu catvāriṃśatsaṃkhyākeṣu bhedeṣu madhye ye svarūpagāyāḥ ṣoḍaśa bhedāste utprekṣānimittasyopādānānupādānābhyāṃ dvātriṃśadbhedā iti militvā ṣaṭpañcāśadbhedā vācyotprekṣāyāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3750: tatra nimittasyopādānaṃ yathā pūrvodāhṛte “snātīva” ityutprekṣāyaṃ nimittaṃ pātakitvamupāttam
GK16visa10cu:3751: anupādāne yathā--”candra ivāparaḥ” ityatra tathāvidhasaundaryādyatiśayo nopāttaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3753: khādiva” ityatra yannimittaṃ baddhamaunatvam “ākhyātumiva” ityatra ca bhūpraveśastayoranupādāne 'saṅgatameva vākyaṃ syāt /
GK16visa10cu:3756: ye svarūpagāyāḥ ṣoḍaśa bhedāḥ jātigāminyo jātyā catastro,
GK16visa10cu:3761: naca nimittānu pādāne kathaṃ taddvaividhyaghaṭitaṃ ṣoḍaśatvam aṣṭatvasyaivaucityāditi vācyam
GK16visa10cu:3785: tathā ca phalagāmitvahetugāmitvadvaividhyād dvātriṃśatprakārā iti vakṣyate /
GK16visa10cu:3790: (vi, ka) nanu nimittānupādānakṛtā paraṣoḍaśavṛddhiḥ kathaṃ na pradarśyate ityāha-- asyāmapīti
GK16visa10cu:3795: hetuḥ, tadanupādāne tu lajjāhetvadarśanāllajjotprekṣā pramātrā boddhā niścetumaśakyaivetyarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:3796: tadaniścaye 'cetanasya tanayugmasya lajjāsambhavāt tadanvayo bādhita eva syādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3822: uktyanuktyoḥ prastutasya pratyekaṃ tā api dvidhā /
GK16visa10cu:3837: anuktau yathā mama prabhāvatyāma--”pradyumnaḥ--iva hi samprati digantaramācchādayatā timirapaṭalena--
GK16visa10cu:3850: atra tamaso lepanasya vyāpanarūpo viṣayo nopāttaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3852: anayorutprekṣānimittaṃ ca tamaso 'tibahulatvaṃ dhārārūpeṇādhaḥ saṃyogaśca yathāsaṃkhyam
GK16visa10cu:3854: ca nimittam, evaṃ nabho 'pi varṣaṇākriyākartṛtvena” ityāhuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3867: saṃyogaviśeṣasyeva hi vyāptināmnāretiśayasthāganasāmyena rūpasambhāvanā utprekṣābhedaḥ pratīyate
GK16visa10cu:3869: sa ca yadi svarūpotprekṣāyāmeva syāttadā ko doṣa ityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16visa10cu:3873: “varṣatīvāñjanaṃ nabhaḥ” ityatra ca dhārārūpeṇādhaḥ saṃyoga ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3875: lepanakartṛtvenotprekṣitaṃ limpatīti tataḥ kartṛtābhidhānāttasya ca tamasi sāmānādhikāraṇyena tadratatāpratyayādityabhisāndhiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3878: naca viṣayasya gamyamānatvaṃ yuktam, tasyotprekṣādhāratvena prastutasyābhidhātumucitatvāt
GK16visa10cu:3880: tathā hi atiśayoktau kamalamanambhasītyādāvivātra viṣayanimittayordvayorapyatra gamyamānatvameva
GK16visa10cu:3881: vyāpanakartaryeva tamasi lepanakartṛtvasambhāvanasya tamaso lepanakartrā sādṛśyavirahācca
GK16visa10cu:3892: hutapāvakadhūmakaluṣākṣyāḥ sudṛśo 'ṅge mānamavakāśamaprāpya lāvaṇyavāripūra iva aśrucchalena vigalatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3904: atra guṇavattve śleṣaḥ kambugrīvādhivāsādiveti hetūtprekṣāyā hetuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3908_0: āvaraṇayantritatvena saṃkaṭād duḥ khadrāyakāt śuktimādhyād vinirgato muktotkaraḥ sārasākṣyā asyā kamanīyakambugrīvādhivāsād
GK16visa10cu:3908_1: guṇaṃvattvaṃ tantamattvameva, guṇavattvaṃ jyotirādhikyamāpeti jānīmahe utprekṣāmahe ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3911: atra tantorvāstavatvānna tatprāptihetūtprekṣā sambhavatītyato guṇapadaśleṣāj jyotirviśeṣaprāptihetūtprekṣā ityataḥ śleṣanirvāhyā iyamutprekṣā /
GK16visa10cu:3918: (lo, u) jānīmahe iti manye ityādayo 'pyutprekṣāvācakā jñeyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3920: tatra kiṃśabdasya prayoge yathā gopīnāthasya gaṅgāvarṇana---
GK16visa10cu:3922: vikrīya kaivalyamamuṣya mūlyaṃ varāṭasaṃkhyāṃ kimiyaṃ karoti” //
GK16visa10cu:3927: paryavasāne tu jaladhitīre śaivālasthiteḥ sambhāvanānupapattau sambhāvanotthāpanamityutprekṣā
GK16visa10cu:3931: pārejalamiti---murāriḥ śrīkṛṣṇaḥ nīranidheḥ samudrasya pārejalaṃ jalasya pāre kūle vanāvalīrapaśyat
GK16visa10cu:3933: punaḥ kīdṛśī ? utkalikāsahastreṇa taraṅgasahastreṇa pratikṣaṇotkūlitānāṃ śaivalānāmābhā ivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3938: “śaivalābhā'; ityanenaivopamāparyavasānasambhave utkūlatvakathanamanupayuktamata utkūlitaśaivalābhā iveti paryavasāne utprekṣetyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3950: karṇe mṛgāyatākṣyāḥ kuṭilaḥ kaṭākṣaḥ” ityādau ca jñeyam /
GK16visa10cu:3963: viṣayasya candrikāderjñānameva nāsti, tadupanibandhanasya kavinaiva kṛtatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3966: (vi, ña) bhrāntimadalaṅkāre niścayo 'tra tu utkaṭakoṭikaḥ saṃśaya iti bhedasambhave 'pi bhedakāntaramāha---bhrāntimadalaṅkāra iti /
GK16visa10cu:3970: nanu, “na kasya kurute cittabhramaṃcandrikā” ityuktitaścandrikātvena jñānamastītyata āha---tadupanibandhasyeti
GK16visa10cu:3972: tathā ca kavyuktyā śrotṝṇāṃ ballavādīnāṃ na candrikātvena jñānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3981: saṃdehe tu samakakṣatayā koṭidvayasya pratītiḥ, iha tūtkaṭā saṃbhāvyabhūtaikakoṭiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3982: atiśayoktau viṣayiṇaḥ pratītasya parvavāsane 'satyatā pratīyate, iha tu pratītikāla eveti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3984: (vi, ṭa) tarhi sandehālaṅkārābheda ityata āha---sandeha iti /
GK16visa10cu:3992: vastutastu yonibahirbhāvarūpaprasavabādhasyeva nāyikāśirasi kalāpabhādhasyāpi sattve evāhāryatadubhayabuddhisattvenobhayatra
GK16visa10cu:3993: kintūtprekṣā utkaṭakoṭikasandeha rūpā, atiśayoktistu niścayarūpeti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3994: “kathamupari” ityatra hi kalāpasyāhāryaniścaya eva kathaṃpadabodhyaḥ sandehaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3998: “rañjitā nu vividhāstaruśalā nāmitaṃ nu gaganaṃ sthagitaṃ nu /
GK16visa10cu:3999: pūritā nu viṣameṣu dharitrī saṃhṛtā nu kakubhastimireṇa” //
GK16visa10cu:4009: ityatra yattarvādau timirākrāntatā rañjanādirūpeṇa saṃdihyata iti saṃdehālaṅkāra iti kecidāhuḥ,
GK16visa10cu:4011: iha tu tarvādivyāpteḥ pratisaṃbandhibhedo vyāpanādernigaraṇena rañjanādeḥ sphuraṇaṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:4015: tasyāścātra sphuṭatayā sadbhāvāt nuśabdena cevaśabdavattasyādyotanādutprekṣaiveyaṃ bhavituṃ
GK16visa10cu:4023: nanu prativiśeṣyaṃ sandehā eva bahavaḥ syurityatra
GK16visa10cu:4028: anye tu sandehālaṅkāraviśeṣa ityāhuḥ, taddarśayati---anye tviti /
GK16visa10cu:4038: tarvādivyāpteḥ--tarugaganādau tamaso vyāpanasya sambandhinastarugaganādayaḥ , tadabhedād vyāpanasyāpi bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4048: “yadetaccandrāntarjaladalavalīlāṃ vitanute tadācaṣṭe lokaḥ śaśaka iti no
GK16visa10cu:4055: candrasyāntaryadetadvastu, jaladalavasya jaladakhaṇḍasya jaladakhaṇḍasya sādṛśyarūpāṃ līlāṃ vitanute tad vastu, lokaḥ śaśaka iti
GK16visa10cu:4057: anyajanaṃ prati tadācaṣṭāṃ, māṃ prati tu na tathācaṣṭe ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4060: tvayā vandīkṛtānāmarīṇāṃ viraheṇākrāntānāṃ tadīyataruṇīnāṃ kaṭākṣolkāpātairjāto yo vraṇastasya kiṇo vraṇasthāne prakaṭabhāgaḥ, sa eva kalaṅko doṣaḥ, taccihnitā tanuryasya tādṛśam /
GK16visa10cu:4084: viṣayiṇo 'bhedapratipattirarthād viṣaye adhyavasāya iha vivakṣita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4088: tadapyavispaṣṭārthamato viśeṣārthakaṃ śabdaṃ vinā vyañjanayaiva viṣayaniṣedhabuddhiradhaḥ karaṇam /
GK16visa10cu:4094: kintu apahnutidhvanau apahnutāvevātivyāptiriti, atiśayoktau tu apahnutipūrvake 'nyatādātmyāropa ityanayorbhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4095: asya cotprekṣāyāṃ viṣayiṇo 'niścitatvena nirdeśātsādhyatvam, iha tu niścitatvenaiva pratītiriti siddhatvam /
GK16visa10cu:4096: viṣayanigaraṇaṃ cotprekṣāyāṃ viṣayasyādhaḥ karaṇamātreṇa, ihāpi mukhaṃ dvitīyaścandra ityādau
GK16visa10cu:4098: (vi, tha) siddhatva ityasya vyāvṛttiṃ darśayati---tasya ceti /
GK16visa10cu:4101: utprekṣāvāraṇaṃ niścayatvavivakṣayaiva na tu nigaraṇapūrvakatvavivakṣayeti darśayati---viṣayanigaraṇaṃ ceti /
GK16visa10cu:4103: utprekṣāyāṃ ca viṣayatāvacchedakakoṭeḥ kvacidanuktivaśāt kvaciccoktāyā api anutkaṭatvaśānniṣedhavyañjanā
GK16visa10cu:4105: “ ityatra garbhabahirbhāvarūpaprasavakoṭyā utkaṭāyā anutkaṭāyā guṇānubandhakoṭyā uktāyā eva niṣedhavyañjanā /
GK16visa10cu:4107: atiśayoktiviśeṣe 'pi na tadasambhava ityata āha---ihāpi mukhaṃ dvitīyaḥ ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:4110: dvitīyapadābhāve tu nedṛśaī niṣedhapratītiriti tatra rūpakameva /
GK16visa10cu:4129: kuvalayayugalaṃ tato vilolaṃ tilakusumaṃ tadadhaḥ pravālamasmāt” //
GK16visa10cu:4145: atrādharasya rāgo lauhityam, priyasya rāgaḥ prema, dvayorabhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4166: “asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatirabhūccandro nu kāntipradaḥ śṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svaya nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4167: vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ nu viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:4175: asyā nirmāṇavidhau prajāpatrirnirmātā candraḥ yato 'sau kāntipradaḥ kāntimattvenaiva tasya kāntipradatvaṃ sambhāvyoktam /
GK16visa10cu:4191: indumaṇḍale indīvarasya sambandha eva syādityevaṃ sambandhasambhāvanā
GK16visa10cu:4195: iha yadyapi candramaṇḍalasyendīvaradvayena sambandho na sambhavati tathāpi kavinā nibaddhasya vā sambhāvanārūpeṇāsāvastītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4198: atra prathame granthakṛtaiva udāhṛtam, anyadeva ityādau /
GK16visa10cu:4204: naceha tasyā mukhaṃ candra itivadāropamūlaṃ rūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:4206: atra hī madanasya udyamaṃ vināpi kokilarutamātreṇa jagadvaśamāsīdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4209: “iyaṃ kāntā yuvajanamanaso vaśīkaraṇa” mityādau ca hetvalaṅkāro
GK16visa10cu:4211: sa tasyā evāsambandhe sambandharūpeṇa bhedena saṅgṛhyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4212: atra śuddhodāharaṇaṃ virahavarṇane---”dāho 'mbhaḥ prasṛtiṃ pacaḥ pracayavān bāṣpaḥ praṇālocita'; ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:4213: atra dāhādīnām ambhaḥ prasṛtipākādyaiḥ asambandhe 'pi sambandhaḥ siddhatvenoktaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4230: tena siṃhāsanaṃ pitryaṃ maṇḍalaṃ ca kahīkṣitām” //
GK16visa10cu:4257: tathā ca bhinnatvenādhyavasāyādāropaviṣaye 'bhede tadbhinnasya bhedasyāropād bhedaghaṭīto viṣayaviṣayibhāvo 'trāpyastīti sādhitam /
GK16visa10cu:4269: iha cānyādiśabdākhyaṃ lāvāṇyādeḥ kimapi pratinidhivastvantaraṃ nāsti
GK16visa10cu:4272: padārthānāṃ prastutānāmanyeṣāṃ vā yadā bhavet // VisSd_10.47 //
GK16visa10cu:4297: suciraṃ śayitaṃ tena samayena tādṛśarātrirūpeṇa pratibodhitaṃ jāgaritaṃ smaram anulepanādayo abodhiṣata krīḍārthaṃ bodhayāmāsurityarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:4299: tamasaḥ kāmoddīpakatvāt tasmin prastute tatkālīnānāmanyeṣāmuddīpakānāmanulepanādīnāmapi prastutatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4306: taddraṣṭuḥ kasya janasya citte mālatyādīnāṃ kaṭhoratā na bhāsate /
GK16visa10cu:4324: iha ca tulyayogitāyāṃ “hasaścandra ivābhātī'tyādivad dvayoḥ prakṛtatve 'pyupamānopameyabhāvo vaivakṣikaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4335: iha ca dvayoḥ prakṛtāprakṛtatvādivādyabhāvādaupamyasya gamyatvaṃ sphuṭameva /
GK16visa10cu:4342: pūrvavaddhiraṇyakaśipurūpapūrvajanmavat jigīṣuṇā śiśupālenāpi jagad bādhyata ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4345: atra prastutāyāḥ suniścalāyāḥ prakṛteraprastutāyāśca yoṣita ekānugamanakriyāsambandhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4346: “dūraṃ samāgatavati tvayi jīvanāthe bhinnā manobhavaśareṇa tapasvinī sā /
GK16visa10cu:4347: uttiṣṭhati svapiti vāsagṛha tvadīya- māyāti yāti hasati śvasiti kṣaṇena”
GK16visa10cu:4352: tapasvinī duḥ khānvitā sā tava priyā vāsagṛhagamanaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:4356: atra ca guṇakriyayorādimadhyāvasānasadbhāvena traividhyaṃ na lakṣitam,
GK16visa10cu:4363: “rahei mihireṇa ṇahaṃ raseṇa kavviṃ sareṇa jovvaṇaaṃ /
GK16visa10cu:4368: eko 'pi dharmaḥ sāmānyo yatra nirdiśyate pṛthak /
GK16visa10cu:4372: tena vākyadvaye ye upameyopamāne, tayoreko 'pi sāmānyo dharmaḥ pṛthakśabdabhedena yatrālaṅkāre nirdiśyate sā prativastūpametyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4374: bodhyatā ca kvacicchabdadvayena śaktilakṣaṇābhyāṃ kvaciccopameyagatasya śabdaśaktyā dhramāntare tadvaidharmyeṇa vyañjanayā /
GK16visa10cu:4378: evaṃ ca pratinirdiṣṭena vākyārthena vākyārthasya upamāsādṛśyaṃ yasyāmityanena vākyārthasyopamāsādṛśyaṃ yasyāmityanvarthā pratīvastūpamā /
GK16visa10cu:4380: pṛthak paryyāyādinā nirdiśyate pratipādyate paunaruktyanirāsāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4384: itaḥ stutiḥ kā khalu candrikāyā yadabdhimapyuttaralīkaroti” //
GK16visa10cu:4385: atra samākarṣaṇamuttaralīkaraṇaṃ ca kriyaikaiva paunaruktyanirāsāya bhinnavācakatayā nirdiṣṭā
GK16visa10cu:4390: atra damayantī upameyā candrikā upamānaṃ tayordhorākarṣaṇameko dharmaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4399: “vimala eva ravirviśadaḥ śaśī prakṛtiśobhana eva hi darṇaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4400: śivagiriḥ śivahāsasahodaraḥ sahajasundara eva hi sajjanaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:4415: (vi, ṅa) vaidharmyeṇa yatheti---upameye nirdiṣṭadharmaviparītād dharmyantare nirdiṣṭāddharmād vyañjanayā labhyenopamānaniṣṭhasādharmyeṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4417: āvantyo 'vantīdeśīyāḥ strīrvinā, ratikarmaṇi nānyāḥ sudṛśo nipuṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4418_0: atra svakarmacāturyasya upameyāsu cakorīṣu nirdiṣṭasya viparīto dharmaḥ avantīyastrībhinnastrīṣu nirdiṣṭo ratyanaipuṇyarūpaḥ
GK16visa10cu:4418_1: tato vyañjanayā upamāneṣu avantīstrīṣu svakarmacāturyyaṃ sādharmyaṃ pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:4425: sadharmasya sādhāraṇaikadharmasya, pratibimbanamubhayatra nirdiṣṭābhyāṃ parasparasamānābhyāṃ dharmābhyāmekasya tasya vyañjanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4426: sadharmaḥ prasiddha evaṃ vivakṣita ityaprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ vyaktirbhaviṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:4427: prativastūpamāyāṃ tūpameyanirdiṣṭo dharmo vācya eva upamānanirdiṣṭaśabdasya lakṣaṇayā kvacicchaktyā vā sa bodhya iti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4437: atra karṇe madhudhārāvamananetrahāraṇe dharmai bhinnau prītijanakatayā parasparasamānau /

GK16visa10cu:6084: guṇābhāve tu tādṛśaṃ duḥ khaṃ na bhavatītyāha--asaṃjāteti /
GK16visa10cu:6086: asaṃjātatatskandho galiralaso gauḥ sukhaṃ svapiti, natu dhuri niyujyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6087: atra dhuri niyujyamānadhūryaprāṇī sāmānyam; aniyujyamānaprāṇiviśeṣeṇa galigavādiyujyamānatvaviruddhadharmeṇa sukhasvāpena dhūryaviruddhadharmeṇa galitvena ca samarthitam /
GK16visa10cu:6088: alasasya sukhasvapanaśīlasya dhūryasya dhuri niyujyamānatvamucitamiti pratīteḥ niyogasamarthanameva niyujyamānadhūryasamarthanaṃ; “saviśeṣaṇe
GK16visa10cu:6090: kāraṇena kāryasamarthanaṃ vaidharmyeṇa yathā--- “sa vijigye raṇe sarvān rākṣasendro baloddhataḥ
GK16visa10cu:6093: atra hi rāvaṇasya vijayaḥ kāryaṃ rāmabāṇakaṭusvādānāsvādena kāraṇena samarthitam /
GK16visa10cu:6094: tadanāsvādena tasya vijaya ucitastadāsvāde sati tadasambhavāditi pratiteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6102: “yattvannetrasamānakānti salile magnaṃ tadindīvaraṃ meghairantaritaḥ priye ! tava mukhacchāyānukārī śaśī /
GK16visa10cu:6108: varṣāsu bhāvanopanītāṃ rāvaṇopahṛtāṃ sītāṃ sambodhya rāmasyeyamuktiḥ
GK16visa10cu:6109: he priye ! tvatsādṛśyenārthād dṛśyamānena yo vinodastanmātramapi me daivena na kṣamyate
GK16visa10cu:6115: vākyatrayasyaiva kriyākārakabhāvena samāptatvād hetava ityatra hetvarthakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6118: na dhatte śirasā gaṅgāṃ bhūribhārabhiyā haraḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:6132: atra paśyantītyasaṃkhyapathgāmiti tvaddānajalavāhinīmiti ca padādeva kriyānanvayenāsamāptatvāt pathatrayagamanāpekṣayā asaṃkhyāpathagamanoktarṣeṇa taddarśanaṃ gopanahetuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6133: iha kecid vākyārthagatena kāvyaliṅgenaiva gatārthatayā kāryakāraṇabhāver'thāntaranyāsaṃ nādriyante /
GK16visa10cu:6134: tadayuktam, tathā hyatra hetustridhā bhavati--jñāpako niṣpādakaḥ samarthakaśceti /
GK16visa10cu:6140: kāryakaraṇasamarthena yānyudāharaṇāni darśitāni tatra hetūnāṃ vākyārthamātragatatvāj jñāpako 'numānasya viṣaya iti /
GK16visa10cu:6141: idaṃ tu kāvyaprakāśakṛdviṣayavibhāgamanādṛtyaiva likhitaṃ tanmate hi praśrasyaiva jñāpako heturna hetvalaṅkāraḥ, tatrottarālaṅkāreṇāghrātatvāt
GK16visa10cu:6142: anyatra tu janako jñāpakaśca heturhetvalaṅkāra eva /
GK16visa10cu:6143: ata eva--- “bhasmoddhūlana bhadramastu bhavate rudrākṣamāle śubhaṃ hā sopānaparamparāṃ girisutākāntālayālaṅkṛtim /
GK16visa10cu:6144: adyārādhanatoṣitena vibhunā yuṣmatsaparyāsukhā- llokocchedini mokṣanāmani mahāmohe nidhīyāmahe”
GK16visa10cu:6145: iti śloke sukhālokaccheditvaṃ mokṣasya mahāmohatve heturityuktyā hetvalaṅkārodāharaṇatayā udāhṛtam /
GK16visa10cu:6146: tatra mokṣasya mahāmohatāyā alīkatvena sukhālokaccheditvasya janakahetutvāsambhavena jñāpakahetutvādeva
GK16visa10cu:6147: anumānaṃ tu sādhyasādhanayorekadharmigatatvena nirdeśe sati hetorhetutvena nirdeśe satyeva
GK16visa10cu:6148: iha tu sukhālokācchedinītyanena hetoreva nirdeśo natu hetutvena /
GK16visa10cu:6149: bhavatāpyanumānodāharaṇatayā vakṣyamāṇeṣu ślokeṣu hetūnāṃ hetutvenaiva nirdeśāt nahi “parvāto vahnimān dhūmāt '; ityukte 'numānam /
GK16visa10cu:6150: tasmād jñāpakahetumātraṃ nānumānālaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ, kintu darśitahetureva /
GK16visa10cu:6155: tathāhi--”yattvannetra-” ityādau caturthapādavākyam, anyathā sākāṅkṣatayāsamañjasameva syāt iti pādatrayagatavākyaṃ niṣpādakatvenāpekṣate /
GK16visa10cu:6157: (vi, ṭa) yattvannaitrasamānakāntītyuktahetvalaṅkārodāharaṇe daivākṣamāṃ prati nīlotpalādīnāṃ salilamagnatvāderjanakahetutvāsambhavāt kaṣṭasṛṣṭyā janakatvamupapādayitumāha /
GK16visa10cu:6171: ityādivadupadeśamātreṇāpi nirākāṅkṣatayā svato 'pi gatārthaṃ sahasā vidhānābhāvaṃ sampadvaraṇaṃ sopapattikameva karotīti pṛthageva kāryakāraṇabhāver'thāntaranyāsaḥ kāvyaliṅgāt /
GK16visa10cu:6174: ityādipadārdhaṃ vinā pūrvārdhavākyaṃ sākāṅkṣamityata uktarityā tatrāpi kāvyaliṅgameva syānnārthantaranyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6176: upadeśamātreṇāpi nirākāṅkṣatayā vṛṇate hi ityādāvākāṅkṣārāhityenāpi gatārthaṃ caritārthamityataḥ sahasā vidhānābhāvaṃ karmabhūtaṃ sampadvaraṇaṃ karttṛ sopapatikameva kurute /
GK16visa10cu:6179: tatra “na vidheye'; ti kṛtyapratyayādinātrāpi “vidadhīte'; tyatra vidhipratyayādupadeśapratītirityarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:6180: parāpakāretyādau samarthanīyānirdeśāt nāstyeva tatrārthāntaranyāsa iti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6182: pṛthvi sthirā bhavetyādau siddhe sthairye upadeśasambhavāt kārmukajyātatīkaraṇaṃ hetumapekṣate eveti tatra hetvalaṅkāraprasaktirdurvāraiva /
GK16visa10cu:6192: (lo, ai) atra hetustridhā bhavati, traividhyena alaṅkāraṇāṃ viṣayavibhāgasthāpanāt kathaṃ tridhetyāha /
GK16visa10cu:6198: anyathā yattvannetra ityādi pādatrayaṃ vināsamañjasaṃ syāt tadaivāsya virahiṇo nāyikāsādṛśyavinodāsahatvasya svato 'pratīteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6203: idañca kāvyaliṅgasya heturvaicitaryāvahanena na nivarttata iti kāvyaliṅgākhyamalaṅkaraṇam
GK16visa10cu:6204: anumānaṃ tu vicchittyā jñānaṃ sādhyasya sādhanāt /
GK16visa10cu:6208: bhaṅgī cāhāryāroparūpā; vahnimān dhūmādityasya vāraṇāya tat /
GK16visa10cu:6209: atra sādhyasādhanayoreva dharmigatatvaṃ kāvyaprakāśakṛduktaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ deyameva /
GK16visa10cu:6248: evañca darśitodāharaṇadvaye “jānīmahe” “manye” iti padayorutprekṣāvācakatve taddvaye utprekṣā naiveti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:6249: tatpadadvayābhāve tu dvayoḥ sandehasaṅkara iti ca bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:6252: anyorudāharaṇayorhṛdaye prayasadbhāvasya smaradhāvanasya ca kāraṇarūpasya sādhyasyāpi padmakuḍmalatā śarapatanañca sādhanaṃ yathā parvato 'yaṃ vahnimān dhūmavattvādityādau /
GK16visa10cu:6256: atra svacchānāṃ patitaparihārarūpasāmānyasya jalānāmasitotpale nirasanarūpo viśeṣarūpaḥ sādhanam
GK16visa10cu:6269: hetumatā kāryeṇa saha hetorabhedenābhidhābhidhānaṃ hetunāmālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6274: atra ca śuddhasāropā lakṣaṇaiva, nahyayamalaṅkāra iti kāvyaprakāśakṛt
GK16visa10cu:6293: asya ca vicchittiviśeṣasya sarvālaṅkāravilakṣaṇatvena sphuraṇātpṛthagalaṅkāratvameva nyāyyam
GK16visa10cu:6297: he tanvi ! yadi kupitāsi tadā karajakṣataṃ vidhāya bhujapāśābhyāmasya
GK16visa10cu:6310: vaktumiṣṭasya vastuno niṣedhābhāso 'niṣedhābhiprāyatvena niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:6313: vakṣyamāṇasya uktasya vā vaktumiṣṭasya niṣedhābhāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6318: ayamarthaḥ-vivakṣitasya vastunaḥ prākaraṇikatvādayukto niṣedhaḥ kutaḥ san bādhitasvarūpo yatrābhāsatāmavagamayati sa ākṣepo 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6322: kvacid vakṣyamāṇaviṣayaḥ kvaciduktaviṣaya iti dvividha ākṣepo
GK16visa10cu:6324: tatra vakṣyamāṇaviṣaye kvacitsarvasyāpi sāmānyataḥ sūcitasya niṣedhaḥ kvacidaṃśoktāvaṃśāntare niṣadha iti dvau bhedau /
GK16visa10cu:6329: kṣaṇamiha viśramya sakhe ! nirdayahṛdayasya kiṃ vadāmyathavā” //
GK16visa10cu:6330: atra sakhyā virahasya sāmānyataḥ sūcitasya vakṣyamāṇaviṣaye niṣedhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6339: virahasya virahāvasthāyāḥvakṣyamāṇe viśeṣe pāṇḍutvakṛśatvādau nirdayahṛdayatvena tu sāmānyataḥ sūcanam /
GK16visa10cu:6342: (lo, u) sarvatrāpi vakṣyamāṇasya virahasya sāmānyataḥ sūcanaṃ smaraśaravidhurāyā iti pratipādanāt
GK16visa10cu:6354: “bālaa ! ṇāhaṃ dūtī tua piosi tti ṇa maha vāvāro /
GK16visa10cu:6355: sā marai tujjha aaso etnaṃ dhammakkharaṃ bhaṇimo” //
GK16visa10cu:6360: “bālaka nāhaṃ dūtī tiṣṭha priyo 'sīti na mama vyāpāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6361: sā mriyate tavāyaśaḥ etad dharmākṣaraṃ bhaṇāmaḥ // iti /
GK16visa10cu:6366: tathā prāṇimātradharmo vaktavyastatra svapriyatvamanyajanapriyatvaṃ vā na prayojakamityetatsūcanāya priyo 'sītyuktam /
GK16visa10cu:6368: atra sā mriyate ityuktaviṣaye vaktumiṣṭasyātmano dūtītvasya vastunā eva niṣedho natu tadukteḥ
GK16visa10cu:6370: maraṇavyāvarttakadūtītvaviṣayatvena paramparayā tadviṣayatvāt atrādharmato nivṛttaye yathārthavāditvasya viśeṣasya pratipattiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6379: atra tad vyaṅgyaduḥ khātiśayasya viśeṣasya pratipattiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6381: dvitīye 'śakyavaktavyatvādi, tṛtīye dūtītve yathārthavāditvam, caturthe duḥ khasyātiśayaḥ
GK16visa10cu:6387: nanu “karttavyaṃ pratyahaṃ strānaṃ natu rātrau kadācana'; ityatra vihitasya pratyahasnānasya rātrau niṣedhavad vidhiniṣedha evāyam /
GK16visa10cu:6388: sa ca nālaṅkāratāṃ bhajata ityāśaṅkate--na ceti /
GK16visa10cu:6392: (lo, ū) atra ca vihitaniṣedhena vicchitterabhāvāt kṣudratvādyalaṅkāramadhye kāvyaprakāśakārādibhirlākṣitena
GK16visa10cu:6398: “yadvā mṛṣā tiṣṭhatu dainyameta- nnaicchanti vairaṃ marutā kirātāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6400: iha hi prathamapadyoktasya dvitīyapadena niṣedhastāttvika eva /
GK16visa10cu:6401: evañca niṣiddhavidhināpi nāsya sāṅkaryaṃ, sa hi yathā---
GK16visa10cu:6407: maṇau vajrasamutkīrṇo sūtrasthe vāsti me gatiḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:6408: atra padyadvayoktaniṣedhasya tṛtīyapadyena vidhāne niṣedhasyābhāsatā eva /
GK16visa10cu:6409: aniṣṭasya tathārthasya vidhyābhāsaḥ paro mataḥ // VisSd_10.65 //
GK16visa10cu:6412: aniṣṭasyārthasya vidhyābhāso niṣedhabodhako vidhistathā pūrvoktavat viśeṣapratipattaye cettadāpara ākṣepālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6416: yatheṣṭasya niṣedhastathaniṣṭasya nidhiranupapadyamāna ābhāse paryavasāyī dvitīyākṣepālaṅkārabījamiti
GK16visa10cu:6419: “gaccha gacchasi cet kānta ! panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6420: mamāpi. janma tatraiva bhūyādyatra gato bhavān” //
GK16visa10cu:6424: (vi, ra) “gaccha gacchasi cetkānta'; ityatra janmakathanānmaraṇaṃ vyaṅgyam /
GK16visa10cu:6429: yatatra--- yātu yātu kimanena tiṣṭhatā muñca muñca sakhi sādaraṃ vacaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6432: atrodāharaṇavat sarvathā na yātviti tathāvidhāparādhakāle nāyikāyā niṣedhābhāsasya mūḍhānāmapi buddhyanārohāt /
GK16visa10cu:6442: (lo, ḷ) asya cākṣepasya virodhāśrayatvena tadanantaraṃ virodhamūlālaṅkārapradarśanaṃ prakriyate---vibhāvaneti
GK16visa10cu:6443: ucyate camatkārapratipattaye kavinā nibadhyate yasya kasyacitkāraṇasyābhāvaṃ darśayitvetyarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:6448: vinā kāraṇamupanibadhyamāno 'pi kāryodayaḥ kiñcidanyatkāraṇamapekṣyaiva bhavituṃ yuktaḥ
GK16visa10cu:6472: iyañca kāraṇābhāvena paratantratayā kāryetpatterviśiṣṭatayā bhāvanādanvarthā vibhāvanā /
GK16visa10cu:6474: atraiva caturthapāde “kiyantaḥ santi bhūtale” iti pāṭhe tvanuktam /
GK16visa10cu:6478: haratāpi tanuṃ yasya śambhunā na hṛtaṃ balam” //
GK16visa10cu:6482: acintyanimittodāharaṇaṃ taduktaṃ darśayati---yathā sa eka iti /
GK16visa10cu:6488: “yaḥ kaumāra-” ityādeḥ kāraṇasya ca kāryaviruddhāyā utkaṇṭhāyā nibandhanādviśeṣoktiḥ, evaṃ cātra vibhāvanāviśeṣoktyoḥ saṅkaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6501: bhūṣaṇaviruddhasya'bhūṣaṇatvasya ca pratītāvapi na viśeṣoktiḥ pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:6502: na hi tāralyābhāvarūpasya phalābhāvasya manohāritvābhāvarūpasya phalābhāvasya ca pratītyā viśeṣoktiḥ syāt /
GK16visa10cu:6503: tathā dhanino 'pītyādāvadhanitvāviruddhasya dhanitvasya pratītāvapi na vibhāvanāpratītiḥ, nahi adhanitvādeḥ phalānyanunmādādīni
GK16visa10cu:6506: (lo, ai) iha ca kāryābhāva ityādigranthaḥ prathamapariccheda eva
GK16visa10cu:6513: “karpūra iva dagdho 'pi śaktimān yo jane jane namo 'stvavāryavīryāya
GK16visa10cu:6519: kriyā kriyādravyābhyāṃ yaddravyaṃ dravyeṇa vā mithaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6526: tasya jātyā saha virodhastu jāterguṇena saha virodharūpa eveti pūrvagaṇanāpraviṣṭatvānnoktaḥ
GK16visa10cu:6531: paryavasāne tu āvirodha eva anyathā doṣāvahatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6532: guṇasya jātyā saha jāterguṇena saha virodha eveti guṇaviruddhasya traividhyameva /
GK16visa10cu:6539: (vi, ka) tatra jāteścaturbhiśca saha virodhamekaśloke eva darśayati---tava viraha iti /
GK16visa10cu:6546: nalinīdalamapītyatra nalinīdalatvajāternidāgharaviṇā dravyeṇa saha tādātmyena virodhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6547: atrāpi viruddhadharmavyāpyatvād virodhasyaiva puraḥ sphūrttikatvādapikāreṇa virodhabodhanācca na rūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:6552: dvijapatnīnāṃ kaṭhināḥ sati bhavati karāḥ sarojasukumārāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:6555: he nṛpa ! te pūrvaṃ santatetyādinā kaṭhinā dvijapatnīnāṃ karā
GK16visa10cu:6575: rūpamidaṃ madirākṣyā madayati hṛdayaṃ dunoti ca me //
GK16visa10cu:6578: āsecanakaṃ sekena tāpanāśakam amṛtena secanakaṃ vā /
GK16visa10cu:6588: atra haro dravyaṃ, tādātmyena tasya nañarthaviśiṣṭadhāraṇakriyāvirodhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6591: kintu “mokṣyate śiraso gaṅgāṃ bhuribhārakarīṃ hara'; ityevaṃ pāṭhaviśiṣṭamevedamudāharaṇaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:6593: candrasūryayorviruddhaśītoṣṇaguṇavattvena virodhasya puraḥ sphurttikatvād atrāpi na rūpakam
GK16visa10cu:6594: dinādipaścaika eva sūryo nāpare ekādeśā iti na jātivirodhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6598: (vi, cha) atra prathamaśloke jāteścaturbhiḥ saha virodhaṃ grāhayati--atra tava viraha ityādāviti
GK16visa10cu:6610: “tvadvāji-” ityādau “haro 'pi śirasā gaṅgāṃ na dhatte” iti virodhaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:6614: pratīyate, viśoṣoktau ca kāryābhāvena kāraṇameva; iha tvanyonyaṃ dvayorapi
GK16visa10cu:6618: kāryābhāvakāraṇasattvayośca viruddhatvena bhāsamānatvād virodhābhāsatvaprasaktau tata enaṃ viśeṣayitumāha---vibhāvanāyāmiti /
GK16visa10cu:6622: viśeṣoktyudāharaṇeṣu yadyatkāraṇaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ tasyaiva sāmagrītvenādhyāse evaṃ vaicitryāt /
GK16visa10cu:6631: tenānyadā bhinnadeśayordaṇḍaghaṭayoḥ sarvadaiva bhinnadeśayoḥ kāryayośca bhinnadeśatve 'pi nāyamalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6633: “sā bālā vayamapragalbhamanasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarā sā pīnonnatimatpayodharayugaṃ dhatte sakhedā vayam /
GK16visa10cu:6634: sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ doṣairanyajanāśrayairapaṭavo jātāḥ sma ityadbhutam” //
GK16visa10cu:6639: bālā bālyadharmamṛdutvavatī tatkāryaṃ tasyā eva vaco 'prāgalbhyaṃ
GK16visa10cu:6648: (lo, ā) bhinnadeśasthatvamāptatāyāṃ yaddeśameva kāraṇaṃ taddeśameva kāryamityevameva niyamaḥ
GK16visa10cu:6650: guṇau kriye vā cetsyātāṃ viruddhe hetukāryayoḥ // VisSd_10.69 //
GK16visa10cu:6652: virūpayoḥ saṃghaṭanā yā ca tadviṣamaṃ matam // VisSd_10.70 //
GK16visa10cu:6655: hutukāryayorguṇau kriye vā yad yadi viruddhe parasparaviparīte syātāṃ tadā etau dve ca viṣame
GK16visa10cu:6664: “sadyaḥ karasparśamavāpya citraṃ raṇe raṇe yasya kṛpāṇalekhā /
GK16visa10cu:6666: atra kāraṇarūpāsilatāyāḥ “kāraṇaguṇā hi kāryaguṇamārabhante” iti sthaterviruddhā śuklayaśasa utpattiḥ /

GK16visa10cu:7182: “kā visamā devyagaī kiṃ laddhavvaṃ jaṇo guṇaggāhī /
GK16visa10cu:7183: kiṃ sokkhaṃ sukalattaṃ kiṃ duggojjhaṃ khalo loo” //
GK16visa10cu:7186: “kā viṣamā daivagatiḥ kiṃ labdhavyaṃ jano guṇagrāhī /
GK16visa10cu:7187: ki saukhyaṃ, sukalatraṃ, ki durgrāhyaṃ khalo lokaḥ //
GK16visa10cu:7193: “kā viṣamā daivagatiḥ kiṃ labdhavyaṃ jano guṇagrāhī /
GK16visa10cu:7194: ki saukhyaṃ sukalatraṃ kiṃ durgrahyaṃ khalo lokaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7197: na ca kāvyaliṅgam, uttarasya praśnaṃ pratyajanakatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:7200: idaṃ ca jñāpakahetīḥ kāvyaliṅgatvābhāvatvakathanaṃ prāgevārthāntaranyāsavicāre smartavyam
GK16visa10cu:7201: paraṃ praśnajñāpakatve uttarālaṅkāreṇa bādhanānna tatra kāvyaliṅgatvāvakāśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7203: (lo, ṝ) anyavyapohe tātparyyābhāvāt, kintu pūrvajanābhisambandhasya daivagatyāderviṣamatvasya khyapanamātrasya parigatatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7219: tathā tat sahacaritapiṣṭakabhakṣaṇamāvaśyakamato mūṣikeṇa daṇḍo bhakṣita ityanenārthāt kenāpyukteneti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7221: iti yat niyataṃ tasya samānanyāyādarthāntaramuktabhinnortha āpatati pratīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7224: (lo, ḷ) kan pratyayena daṇḍāpūpavat daṇḍāpūpikā, tathāvidhanyāyopi daṇḍāpūpikā /
GK16visa10cu:7225: yena kena vidhinā ca vastvantarasyāgamor'thādāpatanaṃ siddhiriti yāvat /
GK16visa10cu:7228: tathāhi yena khalu mūṣikeṇāpūpasahacarito daṇḍo bhakṣitastena kathamapūpaḥ parityakta iti tathehāpi boddhavyam /
GK16visa10cu:7247: evaṃ muktānāṃ nārīṇāṃ stanamaṇaaḍalaluṭhanena pūrvanyāyāt smarakiṅkarāṇāmapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7249: atitaptamayo 'pi mārdavaṃ bhajate kaiva kathā śarīriṇām” //
GK16visa10cu:7252: sa rājā ajaḥ sahajāṃ svābhāvikīm, atrāyo 'prākaraṇikam /
GK16visa10cu:7255: atra ca samānanyāyasya śleṣamūlatve vaicitryaviśeṣo yathodāhṛte-”hāro
GK16visa10cu:7259: hāroyamityādau muktāpadaṃ smarasyākiṅgaramuktarūper'the mauktike ca śliṣṭam /
GK16visa10cu:7260: luṭhatīti padaṃ ca sāvajñasthitirūpe āliṅgane cārthe śliṣṭam /
GK16visa10cu:7261: vilalāpetyādau ca taptapadamagnisaṃyoge virahaduḥ khe ca śliṣṭam /
GK16visa10cu:7265: hāroyamityatra stanasaṅgihāraluṭhanena stanasaṅgikāmukaluṭhanasya vilalāpetyādau cābhitāpena mārdavasyānumeyatvaprasakteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7269: yadyapi stanasaṅgitvalalluṭhanayoramitaptatvamārdavayośca vyāptirasti, tathā nyāyasya puraḥ sphūrtikatvāt sādhyahetubhāvena nirdeśābhāvācca nānumānamityābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7273: tasya hi pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte pīnatvabhojanādikayoravinābhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7279: ata eva asyāḥ sargavidhau ityatra candramadanayoḥ prajāpatitvavikalpe
GK16visa10cu:7282: “namayantu śirāṃsi dhanūṃṣi vā karṇapūrīkriyantāmājñā maurvyo vā” /
GK16visa10cu:7283: atra śirasāṃ dhanuṣāṃ ca namanayoḥ sandhivigrahopalakṣaṇatvāt sandhivigrahayoścaikadā kartumaśakyatvādvirodhaḥ, sa caikapakṣāśrayaṇaparyavasānaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7284: tulyabalatvaṃ cātra dhanuḥ śironamanayordūyorapi spardhayā sambhāvyamānatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:7288: (vi, va) namayantvityādikaṃ na ślokaḥ, kintu jetṛnṛpaterjetavyanṛpatiṣu jijñāsāvākyamātramidam
GK16visa10cu:7289: praṇipātārthaṃ te rājānaḥ śirāṃsi vā namayantu yuddhārthaṃ dhanurvā namayantu ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7290: tathā ca bhamājñā cākarṇapūrīkriyatāṃ karṇaṃ pūrayitvā śrūyatāṃ yuddhārthaṃ maurvo vākarṇaparyantaṃ nīyatāmityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7304: (lo, o) tulyabalayorekasmin kārye niyojitumarhayoḥ, virodhaḥ ekadā nirvāhayitumaśakyatvāt
GK16visa10cu:7317: davāyovetyādiniyamagarbhatvena ekavyaktikavittābhiprāyeṇa vā virodho darśita iti vā /
GK16visa10cu:7321: guṇau kriye vā yugapatsyātāṃ yadvā guṇakriye /
GK16visa10cu:7326: guṇadvayaṃ vā kriyādvayaṃ vā guṇakriyādvayaṃ vā yadi yugapad varṇitaṃ syādityartaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7333: “haṃho dhīrasamira ! hanta jananaṃ te candanakṣmābhṛto dākṣiṇyaṃ jagaduttaraṃ paricayo godāvarīvāribhiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7334: pratyaṅgaṃ dahasīti me tvamapi ceduddāmadāvāgniva- nmattoyaṃ malinātmako vanacaraḥ kiṃ vakṣyate kokilaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7336: (vi, sa) haṃho dhīreti . mandasyaiva dhairyavattvenākāryanivṛttirūpeṇa sambodhanam /
GK16visa10cu:7343: īdṛśastvamiti virahe me mama pratyaṅgaṃ dāvāgnivad dahasi cet tadā matta unmatto malinātmakaḥ kuṣṇavarṇa eva kuṭilasvabhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7344: vanacaratvena ca lokavyavahārānabhijñaḥ kokilaḥ kiṃ vakṣyate ? sa sutarāṃ dhakṣyatītyarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:7346: (lo, ā) dhīraḥ vaṃśena vidhinā pāṇḍityacca, kṣmābhṛtparvataḥ bhūdharaṇakṣamaḥ kaścit mahāpuruṣaḥ
GK16visa10cu:7350: atra dāhe ekasmiṃścandanakṣmābhṛjjanmarūpe kāraṇe satyapi dākṣiṇyādīnāṃ hetvantarāṇāmupādānam
GK16visa10cu:7362: “śaśī divasadhūsaro galitayauvanā kāminī saro vigatavārijaṃ mukhamanakṣaraṃ svākṛteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7363: prabhūrdhanaparāyaṇaḥ satatadurgataḥ sajjano nṛpāṅganagataḥ khalo manasi sapta śalyāni me”
GK16visa10cu:7366: ete sapta dhūsaratvaviśiṣṭaśayyādayaḥ sapta manasi śalyānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7370: evaṃ galitayauvanāyāḥ kāmavattvaṃ kāminyā galitayauvanatvaṃ vā anucitam /
GK16visa10cu:7375: nṛpāṅgaṇa gatasya khalatvaṃ, khalasya nṛpāṅāgaṇagatatvaṃ vā
GK16visa10cu:7378: tatra daivādhānadoṣeṇa śocyasya sattvaṃ svādhīnadoṣeṇa śocyasyāsattvam /
GK16visa10cu:7379: tatra śaśino dhūsaratvaṃ, kāminyā galitayauvanatvasya vidheyatvapakṣe
GK16visa10cu:7381: sajjanasya durgatatvaṃ tadaiva doṣāt śocyatvena śobhanam /
GK16visa10cu:7382_0: galitayauvanāyāṃ kāmavattvasya vidheyatvapakṣe vidheyasya tasya prabhordhanaparāyaṇasya dhanaparāyaṇe prabhutvasya vā, vidheyasya
GK16visa10cu:7382_1: khale nṛpāṅgaṇagatatvasya nṛpāṅgaṇagate khalatvasya vā bidheyasya svādhīnadoṣeṇa
GK16visa10cu:7385: sadasadyogaḥ” iti anye tu--”śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ svataḥ śobhanatvaṃ dhūsaratvādīnāṃ tvaśobhanatvamiti sadasadyogaḥ” /
GK16visa10cu:7386: atra hi śaśiprabhṛtiṣu dhūsaratvāderatyantacitatvamiti vicchittiviśeṣasyaiva camatkāravidhāyitvam
GK16visa10cu:7388: “nṛpāṅganagataḥ khala” iti tu kramabhedādduṣṭatvamāvahati sarvatra viśeṣyasyaiva śobhanatvena prakramāditi /
GK16visa10cu:7393: (vi, kha) pūrvoktaślokepi vidheyānāmeva tathātvād bhinnābhiprāya granthakṛnmanasi kṛtvāparoktaṃ sadasadyogaṃ darśayati---iha keciditi /
GK16visa10cu:7399: uddeśye sattvāsattvābhyāṃ tu teṣāṃ matena camatkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7403: śasī dhūsara ityādyuddeśyavidheyārthakasarvavākye ityarthaḥ, ayaṃ ca doṣaḥ, khale nṛpāṅgaṇagatvasya vidheyatā gatatvasya vidheyatāpakṣa eva
GK16visa10cu:7404: nṛpāṅgaṇagatade khalatvasya vidhayatā pakṣetūddeśyaḥ śobhana eveti naiṣa doṣa iti bodhyam
GK16visa10cu:7415: “aruṇe ca taruṇi nayane tava malinaṃ ca priyasya mukham /
GK16visa10cu:7416: mukhamānataṃ ca sakhi te jvalitaścāsyāntare smarajvalanaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7419: (vi, ga) guṇayoḥ kriyayośca yogapadyarūpaṃ samuccayamāha---aruṇe ceti
GK16visa10cu:7421: tau ca yayoruttarabhūtau tayoryaugapadyabodhakau ityata āhaatrādye iti /
GK16visa10cu:7424: patitaṃ ca mahīpatīndra ! teṣāṃ vapuṣi prasphuṭamāpadāṃ kaṭākṣaiḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7428: atra pūrvārdhe guṇottaraṃ cakāraḥ, pārardhe tu kriyāttaramityanayoryaugapadyam /
GK16visa10cu:7437: na cātra dīpakam, ete hi guṇakriyāyaugapadye samuccayaprakārā niyamena kāryakāraṇakālaniyamaviparyayarūpātiśayoktimūlāḥ, dīpakasya cātiśayoktimūlatvābhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7442: ete guṇākriyāyaugapadye ye samuccayaprakārāste kāryakāraṇayoryaḥ paurvāparyyarūpaḥ kālaniyamaḥ tadviparyyayarūpātiśayoktimūlā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7443: darśitodāharaṇeṣu sarvatraiva guṇayoḥ kriyayorvā kāryakāraṇabhāvasattvepi yaugapadyokteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7446: tathā cet taddvayābhāve satīti viśeṣaṇaṃ deyamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7460: ripoḥ pratīkāre pratyapakāre 'śaktena kenāpi yadi tatsambandhino
GK16visa10cu:7467: tenābhiyojyatayā pratinidhibhūtortho ripoḥ sambandhī varṇyate iti pratyanīkaṃ nāmālaṅkaraṇam
GK16visa10cu:7476: atra madhyena svamadhyajayāt nāyikā siṃhasya ripuḥ, tatkucasādṛśyāt karikumbhau tadīyau /
GK16visa10cu:7479: svasambandhaḥ kucakumbhasambandhaḥ sādṛśyasambandhādidaṃ ca kvacidanukūlasya vāñchitācaraṇepi sambhavati /
GK16visa10cu:7480: yathā viraha vidhurāpi satataṃ bhavataḥ śvāsānuhāriṇī patati ityādau /
GK16visa10cu:7485: prasiddhasyopamānasya upameyatvakalpanaṃ vā niṣphalatvakathanaṃ veti dvividhaṃ pratīpamityarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:7494: “tadvaktraṃ yadi mudritā śaśikathā hā hema sā ceddyutiḥ; taccakṣuryadi hāritaṃ kuvalayaistaccetsmitaṃ kā sudhā ? /
GK16visa10cu:7495: dhikkandarpadhanurbhruvau yadi ca te kiṃ vā bahu brūmahe yatsatyaṃ punaruktavastuvimukhaḥ sargakramo vedhasaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7499: tad vaktrādisattve śaśikathādīnāṃ mudritatvādikaṃ vaiphalyaṃ paryavasitaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:7506: vedhasaḥ sargakramaḥ sṛṣṭikramaḥ punaruktavastuvimukhaḥ, punaruktaṃ yatsādṛśavastvantarakalpanaṃ tadvimukhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7513: atyutkṛṣṭasya vastuno 'tyantamutkarṣamuktvāpi upamānatve 'pi kalpite nirdiṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7518: “ahameva guruḥ sudāruṇānāmiti hālāhala ! tāta ! mā sma dṛpyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7519: nanu santi bhavādṛśāni bhuvane 'smin vacanāni durjanānām” //
GK16visa10cu:7522: he hālāhala, he tāta, ahameva sudāruṇānāṃ guruḥ pradhānam /
GK16visa10cu:7523: ityevaṃ dṛpyo mā sma, evaṃ darpaṃ mā kuru ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7525: nanu bho asmin bhuvane durjanānāṃ bhūyo bahūni vacanāni api bhavādṛśāni bhavattulyāni santītyarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:7533: (vi, ḍha) atra bhavadiva dṛśyante yānītyanena halāhalasyopamānatvenaiva nirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7540: brahmā yathā vedaṃ vadati tathā brāhmaṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7541_0: yadyapi vedasyātivaktā brahmaiveti brāhmaṇasyātyantotkarṣakathanepyupamaiva nāyamalaṅkārastathāpi pratīpaghaṭanārthaṃ samabhivyāharaviśeṣādupamānasya
GK16visa10cu:7541_1: nindāparyyavasāyakatvaṃ nirdeśasya viśeṣaṇaṃ dattamityatastadvāraṇamiti prāgevoktaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:7555: harervakṣaḥ sthale lakṣmīstanakastūrīcihnaṃ bhāratyā nālakṣi, yato nīlotpalabhiyā harereva bhāsā grastamācchāditamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7558: kopoparaktānyapi kāminīnāṃ mukhāni śaṅkāṃ vidadhurna yūnām” //
GK16visa10cu:7561: śoṇa upalo maṇiḥ khacito yatra tādṛśakuṇḍalasya mayūkhaiḥ sadaivāruṇīkṛtāni yasyāṃ puri kāminīnāṃ kopoparaktānyapi mukhāni yūnāṃ kopaśaṅkāṃ na vidadhurityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7575: mīlite utkṛṣṭaguṇena nikṛśṭaguṇasya tirodhānam, iha tūbhayostulyaguṇatayā bhedāgrahaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7584: balabhadravadanacchadmano vadanavyājasya padmasya paryantapātino mudhuliho bhramarān udaṃśūnām udratāṃśūnāṃ daśānānāṃ dantānāmaṃśubhiḥ śvaityaṃ nayan jagādetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7586: mīlite prakṛtasya vastuno vastvantareṇācchādanam, iha tu vastvantaraguṇenākrāntatā pratīyata iti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7599: guṇagaura ! niṣaṇṇo 'pi kathaṃ nāma na rajyasi” //
GK16visa10cu:7602: ananuraktaṃ nāyakaṃ prati anuraktāyā nāyikāyā utkiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:7604: guṇena gaura iti, guṇo gauro yasyeti samāsena ca sambodhanam /
GK16visa10cu:7610: rājahaṃsa ! tava saiva śubhratā cīyate na ca na cāpacīyate” //
GK16visa10cu:7611_0: pūrvatrātiraktahṛdayasaṃparkāt prāptavadapi guṇagauraśabdavācyasya nāyakasya raktatvaṃ na niṣpinnam, uttaratrāprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ
GK16visa10cu:7617: atiriktahṛdayaṃ rāgabhṛtatvenātiriktaguṇaṃ hṛdayaṃ prāptavat prāptaprāyaṃ raktatvaṃ na niṣpannam, nāyakasyotyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7618: itthamatra prakṛtena nāyakasya prakṛtasya hṛdayasya guṇāgrahaṇaṃ darśayitvā prakṛtato 'prakṛtaguṇagrahaṇarūpaphalābhāvamuttaraśloke
GK16visa10cu:7620: yadyapi rājahaṃsopyaprakṛtastathāpi sambodhyatvenā'pekṣikaṃ tasya prakṛtatvaṃ darśayannāha---aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmiti
GK16visa10cu:7621: sati hetau phalābhāvarūpāyā viśeṣokterasya bhedamāha--atra ceti /
GK16visa10cu:7622: viśeṣoktausāmānyata eva phalābhāvaḥ iha tu guṇagrahaṇarūpaphalābhāvarūpo bhaṅgiviśeṣa iti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7623_0: nanu kāryasya kāraṇavirodhiguṇavaśāt kāryasya kāraṇaguṇāgrahaṇaṃ viṣamālaṅkārepyasti ced yadyapi darśitodāharaṇadvaye kāryakāraṇabhāvasattvāt
GK16visa10cu:7627: kayāpi sūcyate bhahgyā yatra sūkṣmaṃ taducyate // VisSd_10.91 //
GK16visa10cu:7635: puṃstvaṃ tanvyā vyañjantī vayasyā smitvā pāṇau khaḍgalekhāṃ lilekha” //
GK16visa10cu:7636: atra kayācitkuṅkumabhedena saṃlakṣitaṃ kasyāścitpuruṣāyitaṃ pāṇau puruṣacihnakhaḍgalekhālikhanena sūcitam /
GK16visa10cu:7639_0: kācid vayasyā sakhī kasyāścinnāyikāyāḥ kaṇṭhe vaktrasyandibhiḥ svedabindupravāhaiḥ bhinnaṃ dvidhākṛtaṃ kuṅkumaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāḥ
GK16visa10cu:7639_1: nāyikāyāḥ pustvaṃ ratau puruṣāyitatvaṃ vyañjayantī smitvā hasitvā tasyāḥ pāṇau khaḍgalekhāṃ lilekhetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7646: atra viṭasya bhrūvikṣepādinā lakṣitaḥ saṅketakālābhiprāyo rajanīkālabhāvinā padmanimīlanena prakāśitaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7649: viṭaṃ dhūrtam upanāyakaṃ tadjijñāsārthaṃ saṃketakālamanasaṃ jñātvā vidagdhayā nāyikayā hasatā netrārpitākūtaṃ yathā syāttathā līlāpadmaṃ nimīlitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7658: āḥ śaityaṃ tuhinācalasya karayorityūcivān sasmitaṃ śailāntaḥ puramātṛmaṇḍalagaṇairdṛṣṭo 'vatādvaḥ śivaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7663_0: śailendreṇa pratipādyamānāyā utsṛjyamānāyā girijāyā hastasya upagūḍhane upagūhanena svarśeṇa ullasaddhiḥ romāñcādibhiḥ romāñcavepathusvedaiḥ
GK16visa10cu:7663_1: visaṃṣṭhulasya vyastasya akhilavaivāhikavidheḥ vyāsaṅgasya vyāpārasya bhaṅgenākulaḥ san āḥ āścarthaṃ tuhinasambandhino 'calasya
GK16visa10cu:7663_2: karayoḥ śaityam ityūcivān san śailāntaḥ pureṇa tadratastrībhiḥ gauryyādimātṛmaṇḍalena svīyagaṇaiśca sasmitaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7669: prakṛtāpahnavakārī yo viṣayo vastu sthāpyamānamaprakṛtaṃ vastu,
GK16visa10cu:7671: idamupalakṣaṇam, apahnavārthapadasya nañāderapyanabhidhānāditi boddhavyam, apahnava hetoḥ śvetasyābhidhānād romāñcādestvanāpahnutatvādeva
GK16visa10cu:7677: gopanīyārthasya mopanakṛtā prathamamabhihitatvācca vyājokteriti likhanena darśita ityarthaḥ

GK16visa10cu:8232: prasāritaṃ gītaṃ yatreti tādṛśaṃ mayūravṛndānāmānartitakaṃ nṛtyayuktaviśeṣaṇakeṣu divaseṣu mahati pūjyaṃ bhavati śobhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8235: abhinavapayoda eva rasikā rasavanta eka nṛtyadarśanārthaṃ rasavanto yatra tādṛśeṣu /
GK16visa10cu:8236: tathā pathikāḥ sāmājikā iva nṛtyādididṛkṣisamājapradhānānīva yatra tādṛśeṣu /
GK16visa10cu:8237: atra rasikasāmājikānāṃ samājapradhānatulyānāṃ ca tṛtyadarśināmāśrayatvena divasānāṃ nṛtyasattārūpakaṃ vyaṅgyamavadheyam /
GK16visa10cu:8248: sāhityadarpaṇamamuṃ sudhiyo vilokya sāhityatattvamakhilaṃ sukhameva vitta
GK16visa10cu:8253: he sudhiyaḥ, śrīcandretyādikṛtamamuṃ sāhityadarpaṇaṃ pustakaṃ vilokya akhilaṃ sāhityatattvaṃ sukhameva sukhaviśiṣṭameva yathā syāttathā vitta jānītetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8258: “āḥ kiṃ kampamurīkaroṣi vasudhe dhūrardite vā bhava- drovindena tu nandamandirakṛtakrīḍāvatāreṇa te /
GK16visa10cu:8259: vikhyātaḥ kavirājirāja iti yaḥ śrīviśvanāthaḥ kṛtī tasyākarṇya giraḥ śirāṃsi bhujagādhīśo dhunīte 'dhunā” //
GK16visa10cu:8262: tāvanmanaḥ saṃmadayan kavīnāmeṣa prabandhaḥ prathito 'stu loke //
GK16visa10cu:8265: prasannendunibhānanā śrīryāvannārāyaṇasyāṅgamalaṅkaroti, tāvatkavīnāṃ manaḥ sammadayannayaṃ prabandho loke prathitostu ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8267: (lo, ṛ) samprati granthasya samāptau svābhīṣṭapūrvakaṃ śubhāśaṃsanaṃ karoti--- yāvaditi
GK16visa10cu:8268: sammadayan samyak prīṇayan--- āstāmanantakṛtinā kṛta eṣa dhīre-
GK16visa10cu:8274: akhilabhāṣaiva vilāsinī nāyikā tasyāḥ bhujaṅgaḥ kāmukastadanuśīlakatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:8275: iti maheśvaratarkālaṅkāraviracitāyāṃ sāhityadarpaṇaṭīkāyāṃ daśamaparicchedavivaraṇam suśliṣṭasaṃskṛtavaśena sukhādhirohā vaiṣamyadustarataraṅgavibhedadakṣā /
